change.subject: Getting ES3 back up to speed
change.description:
Hi Team,

One of our email servers, Exchange Server (ES3) has been acting up. We tried rebooting it, but that didn’t help. We need to get it replaced ASAP.

Regards
Rachel
change.description_text: Hi Team,    One of our email servers, Exchange Server (ES3) has been acting up. We tried rebooting it, but that didn’t help. We need to get it replaced ASAP.   Regards  Rachel
